## **Challenge the Ultimate High-Speed Hoverbike Race!**  
*Raiju: Lightning Arena* combines strategic customization with high-speed VR racing. Take control of your hoverbike and aim to become the **fastest in the world**!  
Race against other players' custom hoverbikes and six AI-controlled drones. Speed alone won’t secure victory—strategic upgrades will determine the winner.  

## **Racing × Build System**  
This game features a unique real-time upgrade system.  
- **Earn points to upgrade:** Points accumulate over time, but you can also earn extra points by attacking enemy players and drones!  
- **Upgrade in real-time during the race:** Spend your points on speed boosts, acceleration enhancements, attack power upgrades, and more. Gather points early, enhance your equipment, and shave down your race time!  

## **Your Avatar, Your Ride!**  
This is a **third-person VR racing game**, where you control a hoverbike ridden by your **Meta avatar**.  
Compete against enemy players, each controlling their own avatar, in high-intensity, immersive VR races.  

## **About Early Access**  
*Raiju: Lightning Arena* is currently in **Early Access**!  
At this stage, the game features **two hoverbikes and one race track**, with more hoverbikes and tracks planned for future updates. Jump in now and be among the first to experience the evolution of VR racing!  

🚀 **Speed and strategy collide—aim to be the fastest in the world!**
